post_message: Caitlyn Jenner just competed in her first golf tournament where she played as a woman. Jenner has always loved golf and this didn’t change when she transitioned. For some reason, it just took this long for her to do a tournament. ET Online shared the details of Caitlyn’s recent golf tournament. Jenner was in the ANA Inspiration Pro-Am in Rancho Mirage, California, on Friday morning and she played alongside former U.S. soccer star Abby Wambach. Caitlyn did a great job on the golf course today... @webpagelink
